00012 #ifndef MFEM_GEOM

00022 class Geometry
00023 {
00024 public:
00025    enum Type { POINT, SEGMENT, TRIANGLE, SQUARE, TETRAHEDRON, CUBE };
00026 
00027    static const int NumGeom = 6;
00028 
00029    static const int NumBdrArray[];
00030 
00031 private:
00032    IntegrationRule *GeomVert[NumGeom];
00033    IntegrationPoint GeomCenter[NumGeom];
00034    DenseMatrix *PerfGeomToGeomJac[NumGeom];
00035 
00036 public:
00037 
00038    Geometry();
00039 
00040    ~Geometry();
00041 
00042    const IntegrationRule *GetVertices(int GeomType);
00043    const IntegrationPoint &GetCenter(int GeomType)
00044    { return GeomCenter[GeomType]; }
00045 
00046    void GetPerfPointMat (int GeomType, DenseMatrix &pm);
00047    void JacToPerfJac(int GeomType, const DenseMatrix &J,
00048                      DenseMatrix &PJ) const;
00049 
00050    int NumBdr (int GeomType) { return NumBdrArray[GeomType]; }
00051 };
00052 
00053 extern Geometry Geometries;
00054 
00055 class RefinedGeometry
00056 {
00057 public:
00058    int Times, ETimes;
00059    IntegrationRule RefPts;
00060    Array<int> RefGeoms, RefEdges;
00061 
00062    RefinedGeometry (int NPts, int NRefG, int NRefE) :
00063       RefPts (NPts), RefGeoms (NRefG), RefEdges (NRefE) { }
00064 };
00065 
00066 class GeometryRefiner
00067 {
00068 private:
00069    RefinedGeometry *RGeom[Geometry::NumGeom];
00070    IntegrationRule *IntPts[Geometry::NumGeom];
00071 public:
00072    GeometryRefiner();
00073 
00074    RefinedGeometry *Refine (int Geom, int Times, int ETimes = 1);
00075    const IntegrationRule *RefineInterior(int Geom, int Times);
00076 
00077    ~GeometryRefiner();
00078 };
00079 
00080 extern GeometryRefiner GlobGeometryRefiner;
